sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import useClipboard from 'react-use-clipboard'

import { LinkItem, LinkUrl, ShortenedLink, CopyIcon } from './styles'

const LinkListItem = ({ link }) => {
  const shortenedLink = `https://rel.ink/${link.hashid}`

  const [isCopied, setCopied] = useClipboard(shortenedLink)

  return (
    <LinkItem>
      <LinkUrl>{link.url}</LinkUrl>
      <ShortenedLink href={shortenedLink}>{shortenedLink}</ShortenedLink>

      <CopyIcon
        onClick={setCopied}
        viewBox='0 0 14 16'
        version='1.1'
        width='14'
        height='16'
        aria-hidden='true'
      >
        <path
          fillRule='evenodd'
          d='M2 13h4v1H2v-1zm5-6H2v1h5V7zm2 3V8l-3 3 3 3v-2h5v-2H9zM4.5 9H2v1h2.5V9zM2 12h2.5v-1H2v1zm9 1h1v2c-.02.28-.11.52-.3.7-.19.18-.42.28-.7.3H1c-.55 0-1-.45-1-1V4c0-.55.45-1 1-1h3c0-1.11.89-2 2-2 1.11 0 2 .89 2 2h3c.55 0 1 .45 1 1v5h-1V6H1v9h10v-2zM2 5h8c0-.55-.45-1-1-1H8c-.55 0-1-.45-1-1s-.45-1-1-1-1 .45-1 1-.45 1-1 1H3c-.55 0-1 .45-1 1z'
        ></path>
      </CopyIcon>
    </LinkItem>
  )
}

export default LinkListItem
